thread.section_title: The Westin New York at Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Responsive
thread.title_full: Responsive - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rmar
title: Responsive
text:
I had requested early arrival and quiet, but my room wasn't ready and then when I finally was given one, it was near the elevator and there was a screaming child next door. Eventually I was moved to a very nice room that was quiet. Pastries and bagels were mediocre at breakfast, but service was excellent at both breakfast and lunch. The room is rather minimalistic and I wasn't fond of the sliding door to the bathroom. But lighting was good..
Room Tip: Away from the elevators for noise control See more room tips
